Editor module¶

Module wich contains the classes and functions related to the editor tab panel

Classes:

Styled_Editor(parent, topwindow, text, on_card)

Customizable Editor page

Functions:

customize_editor(editor, theme_choice)

Change theme of the Editor panel

find_next(editor, evt)

Useful function to find the next occurence of a word on the EditWindow panel

init_editor_style(editor)

Init some settings for Editor Window

replace(editor, evt)

Useful function to replace a the selected text by an other word on the EditWindow panel
class Editor.Styled_Editor(parent, topwindow, text, on_card)¶

Bases: wx.py.editwindow.EditWindow

Customizable Editor page

Parameters

pysh.editwindow.EditWindow (wx.py.editwindow.EditWindow) – see https://wxpython.org/Phoenix/docs/html/wx.py.html

Methods:

Expand(line, doExpand[, force, visLevels, level])

Expand the tab content

FoldAll()

Fold all the tab content

OnFind(evt)

Method to find a string on the current tab editor

OnFindClose(evt)

Close the find and replace dialog

Manage the keyboard events related to the tab

Fold the tab content if an event is happened

Show the Find and Replace dialog and call the bind_find_events method

Manage the syntax highlight on the braces

Bind events of the find and replace dialog

custom_stc()

Custom the editwindow instance based on the model of the wxDemo StyledCtrl2.py

set_style(parent)

Load the first style of the editor

evt (wx.Event, optional) – , defaults to None
